mutants.code:
def shorten_to_date(long_date: str) -> str:
    """
    Shortens the given date and time string to omit the time part.

    Parameters:
    long_date (str): The full date and time string in the format "Weekday Month Day, time".

    Returns:
    str: The shortened date string in the format "Weekday Month Day".
    """
    return long_date.split(',')[1]

def shorten_to_date(long_date: str) -> str:
    """
    Shortens the given date and time string to omit the time part.

    Parameters:
    long_date (str): The full date and time string in the format "Weekday Month Day, time".

    Returns:
    str: The shortened date string in the format "Weekday Month Day".
    """
    return long_date.split(',')[-1]

def shorten_to_date(long_date: str) -> str:
    """
    Shortens the given date and time string to omit the time part.

    Parameters:
    long_date (str): The full date and time string in the format "Weekday Month Day, time".

    Returns:
    str: The shortened date string in the format "Weekday Month Day".
    """
    return long_date.split('')[0]
